titles.title: What Child Is This (William C. Dix)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What child is this who, laid to rest, On Maryâ€™s lap is sleeping? Whom angels greet with anthems sweet, While shepherds watch are keeping?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Why lies He in such mean estate Where ox and ass are feeding? Good Christians, fear, for sinners here The silent Word is pleading.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
